contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = {{PAGENAME}} |native_name = |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |settlement_type = Town |image_flag = |image_seal = |image_map = |map_caption = Map of Djibouti |pushpin_map = Djibouti |pushpin_label_position = bottom |pushpin_mapsize = 250 |pushpin_map_caption = Location in Djibouti |coordinates_region = DJ-DI |subdivision_type = [[Countries of the world|Country]] |subdivision_type1 = [[Regions of Djibouti|Region]] |subdivision_name = [[File:Flag of Djibouti.svg|25px]] [[Djibouti]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Dikhil Region|Dikhil]] |subdivision_type2 = |subdivision_name2 = |established_title = |established_date = |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |area_magnitude = |area_total_sq_mi = |area_total_km2 = |area_land_sq_mi = |area_land_km2 = |area_urban_sq_mi = |area_urban_km2 = |area_metro_km2 = |area_metro_sq_mi = |population_as_of= |population_footnotes = |population_total = 644 |population_urban = |population_metro = |population_density_sq_mi = |population_density_km2 = |timezone = |utc_offset = |timezone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = |latd=11|latm=31|lats=|latNS=N |longd=42|longm=06|longs=|longEW=E |elevation_footnotes= |elevation_m = 250 |elevation_ft = 823 |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Yoboki''' is a town located in the western [[Dikhil Region]] of [[Djibouti]]. It is situated approximately {{convert|100|km|mi|abbr=on}} west of the nation's capital city of [[Djibouti (city)|Djibouti]], and roughly {{convert|40|km|mi|abbr=on}} northwest of [[Dikhil]], the regional capital. ==History== Yoboki has a long history of conflict. Bomb attacks by an unknown perpetrator were reported in mid-May 1990, which affected electric and military installations in the town.<ref name="Britain)1990">{{cite book|author=Economist Intelligence Unit (Great Britain)|title=Country report: Uganda, Ethiopia, Somalia, Djibouti|url=http://books.google.com/books?id=wt80AQAAIAAJ|accessdate=8 March 2011|year=1990|publisher=The Unit}}</ref> In December 1998, the area was also occupied by the [[Ethiopian army]]. However, the [[Military of Djibouti|Djibouti Army]] re-took the town in February 1999. ==Demographics== In 1968, Yoboki had a population of around 200 residents, mostly [[Afar people|Afar]].<ref name="ThompsonAdloff1968">{{cite book|last1=Thompson|first1=Virginia|author2=Richard Adloff|title=Djibouti and the Horn of Africa|url=http://books.google.com/books?id=ohakAAAAIAAJ&pg=PA47|accessdate=8 March 2011|year=1968|publisher=Stanford University Press|isbn=978-0-8047-0650-6|page=47}}</ref> More recent estimates indicate that the town has a population of 644. ==Transport== Yoboki is well connected; [[National Highway 1 (Djibouti)|National Highway 1]], [[National Highway 7 (Djibouti)|National Highway 7]] and [[National Highway 8 (Djibouti)|National Highway 8]] connect it. ==Climate== Yoboki is a good location, and good air, located at an altitude of 250 meters above sea level in low-shrouded mountains and hills" and the surrounding mountains {{Weather box|location = Yoboki |metric first = yes |single line = yes |temperature colour=pastel |Jan high C = 25.2 |Feb high C = 26.1 |Mar high C = 27.9 |Apr high C = 29.8 |May high C = 32.6 |Jun high C = 35.1 |Jul high C = 34.2 |Aug high C = 33.4 |Sep high C = 33.1 |Oct high C = 29.7 |Nov high C = 27.1 |Dec high C = 25.6 |Jan low C = 18.4 |Feb low C = 19.6 |Mar low C = 21.1 |Apr low C = 23.3 |May low C = 26.6 |Jun low C = 27.8 |Jul low C = 25.7 |Aug low C = 24.5 |Sep low C = 23.3 |Oct low C = 22.5 |Nov low C = 20.4 |Dec low C = 19.0 |rain colour=green |Jan rain mm = 6 |Feb rain mm = 6 |Mar rain mm = 3 |Apr rain mm = 7 |May rain mm = 4 |Jun rain mm = 3 |Jul rain mm = 44 |Aug rain mm = 54 |Sep rain mm = 20 |Oct rain mm = 2 |Nov rain mm = 4 |Dec rain mm = 4 |source 1 = Levoyageur Weather<ref name="climate">{{cite web |url=http://www.levoyageur.net/weather-city-YOBOKI.html |title=Levoyageur Weather : Djibouti |deadurl=no |accessdate=11 July 2012}}</ref> |date=July 2012}} ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.maplandia.com/djibouti/dikhil/yoboki/yoboki/ Satellite map at Maplandia.com] * [http://ard-djibouti.org/Edition%20En%20Ligne%20Janvier%202011/img3B.jpg Photograph] {{coord|11|31|N|42|06|E|region:DJ_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Populated places in Djibouti]] {{Djibouti-geo-stub}}
